name: LOGistICAL: Japan
description: LOGistICAL: Japan is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the islands with over 700 towns to Complete. LOGistICAL: Japan game covers the islands of Japan including cities like Tokyo, Osaka, Kyoto and Kobe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
